member.summary: Gets or sets the location and size of the color bar.
member.value: The location and size of the color bar.

member.summary: Gets or sets the bar padding.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.BarStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the bar style.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Color1
member.summary: Gets or sets the first color of the bar.
member.remarks: This property is ignored if the property is set to Custom and a valid color set has been specified

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Color2
member.summary: Gets or sets the second color of the bar.
member.remarks: This property is ignored if the property is set to Custom and a valid color set has been specified

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Color3
member.summary: Gets or sets the third color of the bar.
member.remarks: This property is ignored if the property is set to Custom and a valid color set has been specified, or if the BarStyle is set to TwoColor.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.CustomColors
member.summary: Gets or sets the color range used by the custom bar style.
member.remarks: This property is ignored if the property is not set to Custom

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.LargeChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the selection is moved a large distance.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 10.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper limit of values of the selection range.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 100.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower limit of values of the selection range.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.NubColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the selection nub.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the selection nub.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.NubStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the selection nub style.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the color bar.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.ShowValueDivider
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a divider is shown at the selection nub location.
member.value: true if a value divider is to be shown; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.SmallChange
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the selection is moved a small distance.
member.value: A numeric value. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ColorSlider.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the selection numb on the color slider control.
member.value: A numeric value that is within the and range. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ScreenColorPicker.ShowTextWithSnapshot
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text should be shown when a snapshot is present.
member.value: true if text is to be shown when a snapshot is present; otherwise, false to only show text when no snapshot is available.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ScreenColorPicker.TabIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.
member.returns: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container. The controls in the container are included in the tab order.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ScreenColorPicker.TabStop
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
member.returns: true if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, false. The default is true.Note:This property will always return true for an instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom level of the snapshot image.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.ScreenColorPicker.IsCapturing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating snapshot capture is in progress.
member.value: true if snapshot capture is in progress; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether redraw operations should occur.
